reasoning_log: The matching process relied on identifying distinct room types (commercial lobby, bathroom, bedroom) and then using specific tags (e.g., counter area, wet/dry separation, spaciousness) to differentiate between visually similar candidates. Descriptions 4 and 5 were easily matched to Image 4 (no shower, compact) and Image 5 (wet/dry separation, modern). Descriptions 6 and 7 were matched based on size and furnishing, with Image 6 being the more spacious 'Master Bedroom' (Desc_6) due to the inclusion of a large massage chair and open closet. The commercial spaces (Desc_1, Desc_2, Desc_3) were resolved by assigning Desc_3 to Image 3, which uniquely features a counter/reception area. Desc_1 (regular layout, smooth flow) was assigned to Image 1, which shows a more structured seating arrangement, while Desc_2 (high flexibility, multi-purpose use) was assigned to Image 2, which includes a visible children's play area near the window.

matching_result_list.evidence: Commercial space with large windows ('大面採光') and a highly '規則格局' (regular layout) of tables, supporting '前後動線順暢'.

matching_result_list.evidence: Commercial space featuring large windows and a flexible layout that includes a children's play area (tent/toys), supporting '規劃彈性高' and '可多用途使用'.
